title: How to Use Passion Flower for Health
steps: Use passion flower for minor burns only.
Create a compress for burns using passion flower extract and a cold, damp cloth.
Apply passion flower extract directly to hemorrhoids.

title: How to Mix Essential Oils with Carrier Oils
steps: Don’t use undiluted essential oils on your skin.
Test a mixture on your inner forearm before applying it.
Avoid using essential oils to treat medical conditions.

title: How to Safely Use Essential Oils Topically
steps: Talk to a dermatologist if you have an existing skin condition.
Ask your doctor if you can safely use essential oils.
Contact a doctor if you have a severe reaction to essential oils.

title: How to Use Essential Oils to Prevent an Itchy Scalp
steps: See your doctor if you’re not sure what’s causing your itchy scalp.

Make an appointment if you experience severe itching or other serious symptoms.
Seek medical care if you have a severe reaction to an essential oil.

title: How to Test Essential Oils for Purity
steps: Select an oil to test and get a piece of blank paper.
Place one drop of the oil on the paper.
Allow the oil to dry completely.
Check the places where you dropped the oil for a leftover ring of oil or grease.
Send your oils to a lab for testing if you will be using them for professional reasons.

title: How to Use Peppermint Oil
steps: Read the label.

title: How to Use Laser Pointers Safely
steps: Never aim a laser pointer at planes, trains, boats, or automobiles.
Do not bring laser pointers to concerts or sporting events.
Never point the laser pointer at animals.
Avoid skin contact for prolonged periods of time.
